intro: A Digital Dream... or Your Worst Nightmare?
description:
In MISDIE: Into the Game, one wrong tap on your phone pulls you into a world you were never meant to visit. Bright colors and familiar faces quickly give way to something far stranger—and far more dangerous.

Trapped inside a digital dream that shifts into a nightmare, you’ll follow cryptic clues, encounter characters who aren’t quite what they seem, and piece together the truth hidden beneath the surface. Some will offer help. Others will play games of their own. And somewhere, something is always watching.

Blending vibrant anime visuals with a chilling atmosphere, MISDIE: Into the Game is a journey through mystery, memory, and fear. Trust carefully, move quickly, and remember: in this world, nothing stays friendly for long.
